CN.content:

Paragraph: Acetylation of 2 with Zn powder and acetic anhydride performed under basic conditions produced yellowish benzodithiophene-4,5-diyl diacetate ( 3 ) powder in a good yield of 85% .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| 2 |
| benzodithiophene-4,5-diyl diacetate (3) |
| Zn powder |
| acetic anhydride |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| benzodithiophene-4,5-diyl diacetate (3) |

The other entities in the paragraph, "Acetylation of 2", "with Zn powder and acetic anhydride", "performed under basic conditions", "produced", "yellowish", "good yield of 85%", do not clearly refer to material names.
